titles.title: SMART BASE Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study of the potential application of smart technology on military installations.
SMART BASE Act
Strengthening our Military Assets by Researching Technology to Better Assure Security and Efficiency Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Emerging Threats and Capabilities.

bill.summary:
Strengthening our Military Assets by Researching Technology to Better Assure Security and Efficiency Act or the SMART BASE Act
This bill directs the Department of Defense to report to Congress on the effects of using smart technology (i.e., interconnected devices and appliances that rely on technologies such as automation, artificial intelligence, and wireless communications) on military installations.
